thread.title: Redskins notebook: Riley out, Culliver questionable
thread.title_full: Redskins notebook: Riley out, Culliver questionable

author: mphillips@timesdispatch.com(MichaelPhillips)
title: Redskins notebook: Riley out, Culliver questionable
text:
JAMES H. WALLACE/TIMES-DISPATCH 20150425_SPO_SKIN_JW11 
Redskins linebacker Ryan Kerrigan #91, Keenan Robinson #52 and Perry Riley Jr. celebrate after the defense stopped Miami running back Damien Williams #34k on a fourth down play during the Washington Redskins game against the Miami Dolphins at FedEx Field Sunday 9/13/2015. ADVERTISEMENT Redskins notebook: Riley out, Culliver questionable BY MICHAEL PHILLIPS Richmond Times-Dispatch Richmond Times-Dispatch 
Riley out, Culliver questionable 
Washington Redskins linebacker Perry Riley Jr. won’t play Sunday against the Philadelphia Eagles as he continues to recover from a calf injury.
